DOC.brief_title: A Double-Blind , Randomized Parallel Group Study Comparing Procysteine Placebo HIV-Infected Patients Who Are Taking Antiretroviral Nucleosides
DOC.detailed_description: All patient must receive treatment antiretroviral nucleoside addition study treatment . Patients randomize equally 1 3 outpatient dosage group . Group 1 receive placebo ; Group 2 receives low dose Procysteine ; Group 3 receive high dose Procysteine . Patients receive study treatment 6 month ( total duration patient participation 30 week ) .
